org.jetel.ctl

Class ParserHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jetel.ctl.ParserHelper

  • public class ParserHelper
extends java.lang.Object
    Class for management of symbols and symbol tables. Stores information about symbols declared in specific scope as well as information about local declarations of functions.
    Since:
    28.5.2006

      • enteredBlock

        public boolean enteredBlock(CLVFFunctionDeclaration node)
        Registers function as a new code-block and creates a separate scope for it. Stores newly allocated scope in the function node.
        Parameters:
        node - function node to register
        Returns:
        false if duplicate declaration; true otherwise
